author: andreas
content: Hmm, I see what you mean and I have considered cropping (after your comment), but funnily enough the result, although aesthetically pleasing, did not interest me. I don't exactly know what the visual idea behind my image was, but obviously a square crop was not part of the idea. In other words: I would like it in someone else's image, in mine I don't. It's interesting to think about that ðŸ™‚
